item.title: ARM templates - iterate & deploy resource
item.description: Background üßê I like ARM templates, I use it a lot to deploy Azure cloud resources but as all things it has some pain points associated with it. In this post, let’s see how you can iterate over based on certain logic and deploy multiple resources using linked templates.
